techmeme.title: Hundreds of public figures sign a Future of Life Institute statement urging a ban on the development of AI superintelligence until it can be deployed safely (David Ingram/NBC News)
Palworld developer Pocketpair says its new publishing division won't fund games that use GenAI, saying it "doesn't believe" in the technology (Chris Kerr/Game Developer)
Sources: Sequoia COO Sumaiya Balbale resigned after the firm refused to discipline partner Shaun Maguire over his comments calling Zohran Mamdani "an Islamist" (Financial Times)
Samsung says it's working on smart glasses built on top of Android XR in partnership with Warby Parker and Gentle Monster, during its Worlds Wide Open event (Sabrina Ortiz/ZDNET)
Samsung's Galaxy XR headset includes an Explorer Pack that bundles a year of Google AI Pro, YouTube Premium, Play Pass, and more with purchases through year-end (Matt Horne/Android Authority)
